philosophy: Hub & Spoke content topology: every pillar has one Hub article that links to all Spoke articles. Each article atomizes into 6 platform formats. Distribution follows a 1→10 multiplier.

atomizationRules.blogToX: Extract 3-5 key principles, each becomes a tweet. Hook tweet is a bold claim or question. Final tweet links back.
atomizationRules.blogToLinkedIn: Rewrite as personal narrative. First 2 lines must hook. Include 1 specific metric. End with soft question CTA.
atomizationRules.blogToNewsletter: Summarize in 3 paragraphs: what, why it matters, link to deep dive.
atomizationRules.blogToShort: Find the single most surprising insight. Script 30-60s around it. Text overlay + voiceover or music.
atomizationRules.blogToInfographic: Extract the framework/model/comparison. Use InfoGenius with pillar-specific style settings.
atomizationRules.blogToCarousel: Break into 5-8 slides in Canva. Slide 1 = hook, slides 2-7 = points, slide 8 = CTA.

youtubeShorts.tool: Opus Pro (opus.pro) — AI-powered video clipping. Upload YouTube URL, auto-generates viral clips with captions.
youtubeShorts.workflow: 1. Upload video to Opus Pro → 2. Select top 3 clips → 3. Add FrankX watermark in Canva → 4. Upload to YouTube Shorts + X + LinkedIn

metrics.hubSpokeRatio: Each Hub should link to 8+ Spokes. Each Spoke links back to Hub + 2 sibling Spokes.
